content: You'll need to beat the Venom Daoist twice in Chapter 4 to gain access to Purple Cloud Mountain. You can first fight him in the Webbed Hollow, and then fight him again in the Temple of Yellow Flowers. After this fight, a wall will appear that will allow you to go to Purple Cloud Mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Purple Cloud Mountain'.
The content is as follows:
You'll need to beat the Venom Daoist twice in Chapter 4 to gain access to Purple Cloud Mountain. You can first fight him in the Webbed Hollow, and then fight him again in the Temple of Yellow Flowers. After this fight, a wall will appear that will allow you to go to Purple Cloud Mountain.
